name: Own the Skies
description:
Own the Skies is an analog card game that can be played here and is for 3-6 players.

Files Included: 

Rules.pdf and Rules2.pdf are the first and second pages of the Rules.

OTS1.8.pcio: If the link above does not work, the game can be imported to the playingcards.io website with this file at: playingcards.io -> Custom Room -> Room Options -> Import Game.

PrintNPlay.txt: Contains instructions for printing out the game if you would like to play an analog version of the game.

To Print: Contains all of the cards in pdf form for printing a physical version.
